text: Gelu Radu (born 3 November 1957) is a retired Romanian featherweight weightlifter. He won a silver medal at the 1984 Olympics and a bronze at the 1983 World Championships. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic weightlifters of Romania Category:Weightlifters at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Weightlifters at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic silver medalists for Romania Category:Olympic medalists in weightlifting Category:Medalists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:World Weightlifting Championships medalists Category:Romanian male weightlifters
title: Gelu Radu
